verbs.description: [ARG0: sen joe] [ARGM-ADV: donnelly] [V: says] [ARG1: he willing to look at legislation to end birthright citizenship during a tuesday night debate incumbent indiana sen joe donnelly d said that he is willing to consider any legislation regarding the termination of birthright citizenship on tuesday president donald trump announced that he wanted to use an executive order to end birthright citizenship trump expressed his displeasure with the current system which permits children born to noncitizen parents while in the u s to be granted citizenship you can read more about the issue here what did donnelly say during the televised debate with his challenger mike braun who is a republican businessman and former indiana state representative donnelly said that it only made sense for him to be open to immigration reform i ’m the only person on this stage who voted three times for a border wall i voted against sanctuary cities i ’ve stood for secure borders with john mccain when in 2013 we passed legislation that would have provided an additional 20 000 border agents … joe donnelly lindsey graham u s john mccain donald trump sen lindsey graham president mike braun indiana president donald trump sen joe donnelly]

sen joe donnelly says [ARG0: he] willing to [V: look] [ARG1: at legislation to end birthright citizenship] [ARGM-TMP: during a tuesday night debate] incumbent indiana sen joe donnelly d said that he is willing to consider any legislation regarding the termination of birthright citizenship on tuesday president donald trump announced that he wanted to use an executive order to end birthright citizenship trump expressed his displeasure with the current system which permits children born to noncitizen parents while in the u s to be granted citizenship you can read more about the issue here what did donnelly say during the televised debate with his challenger mike braun who is a republican businessman and former indiana state representative donnelly said that it only made sense for him to be open to immigration reform i ’m the only person on this stage who voted three times for a border wall i voted against sanctuary cities i ’ve stood for secure borders with john mccain when in 2013 we passed legislation that would have provided an additional 20 000 border agents … joe donnelly lindsey graham u s john mccain donald trump sen lindsey graham president mike braun indiana president donald trump sen joe donnelly

sen joe donnelly says he willing to look at [ARG0: legislation] to [V: end] [ARG1: birthright citizenship] during a tuesday night debate incumbent indiana sen joe donnelly d said that he is willing to consider any legislation regarding the termination of birthright citizenship on tuesday president donald trump announced that he wanted to use an executive order to end birthright citizenship trump expressed his displeasure with the current system which permits children born to noncitizen parents while in the u s to be granted citizenship you can read more about the issue here what did donnelly say during the televised debate with his challenger mike braun who is a republican businessman and former indiana state representative donnelly said that it only made sense for him to be open to immigration reform i ’m the only person on this stage who voted three times for a border wall i voted against sanctuary cities i ’ve stood for secure borders with john mccain when in 2013 we passed legislation that would have provided an additional 20 000 border agents … joe donnelly lindsey graham u s john mccain donald trump sen lindsey graham president mike braun indiana president donald trump sen joe donnelly

sen joe donnelly says he willing to look at legislation to end birthright citizenship during a tuesday night debate [ARG1: incumbent indiana sen joe] [ARG1: donnelly] [V: d] said that he is willing to consider any legislation regarding the termination of birthright citizenship on tuesday president donald trump announced that he wanted to use an executive order to end birthright citizenship trump expressed his displeasure with the current system which permits children born to noncitizen parents while in the u s to be granted citizenship you can read more about the issue here what did donnelly say during the televised debate with his challenger mike braun who is a republican businessman and former indiana state representative donnelly said that it only made sense for him to be open to immigration reform i ’m the only person on this stage who voted three times for a border wall i voted against sanctuary cities i ’ve stood for secure borders with john mccain when in 2013 we passed legislation that would have provided an additional 20 000 border agents … joe donnelly lindsey graham u s john mccain donald trump sen lindsey graham president mike braun indiana president donald trump sen joe donnelly

sen joe donnelly says he willing to look at legislation to end birthright citizenship during a tuesday night debate [ARG0: incumbent indiana sen joe donnelly d] [V: said] [ARG1: that he is willing to consider any legislation regarding the termination of birthright citizenship on tuesday] president donald trump announced that he wanted to use an executive order to end birthright citizenship trump expressed his displeasure with the current system which permits children born to noncitizen parents while in the u s to be granted citizenship you can read more about the issue here what did donnelly say during the televised debate with his challenger mike braun who is a republican businessman and former indiana state representative donnelly said that it only made sense for him to be open to immigration reform i ’m the only person on this stage who voted three times for a border wall i voted against sanctuary cities i ’ve stood for secure borders with john mccain when in 2013 we passed legislation that would have provided an additional 20 000 border agents … joe donnelly lindsey graham u s john mccain donald trump sen lindsey graham president mike braun indiana president donald trump sen joe donnelly
